document.full_text: the indiana state house on wednesday passed a bill that would ban abortions after 20 weeks and cuts funding for planned parenthood of indiana, sending it to governor mitch daniels for his signature.
document.title: indiana passes bill banning abortions after 20 weeks
lines_and_colors: the indiana state house on wednesday passed a bill that would ban abortions after 20 weeks and cuts funding for planned parenthood of indiana, sending it to governor mitch daniels for his signature.
